item.title: Azure DevOps Services Pricing
item.description: Azure DevOps Services pricing helps you scale your DevOps capabilities while controlling your costs. With flexible pay-as-you-go options, you can grow your DevOps practice incrementally as your needs change. Your Azure DevOps Services bill includes the following elements: Azure Pipelines Flat rate for Microsoft-hosted parallel jobs and self-hosted parallel jobs No charge for the free tier Azure Artifacts Tiered pricing based on total artifact storage Azure Boards, Repos, Test Plans, etc.
